Design with Canva
 
 
 
Community Spotlight
 
 
Here’s to the unsung heroes
 
 
This week, we celebrated five extraordinary teachers – the newest members of the National Teachers Hall of Fame.

These educators pour their hearts into their classrooms. So we gave some of that love back, donating $200K to support them and their schools.

The surprise was captured on video and honestly, it’s too special not to share.
Watch the surprise

email_payload.body:
Tips to get the most out of Claude, your new AI assistant.







Start chatting with Claude




From brainstorming your next report to debugging tricky code, or even 
suggesting dinner ideas—Claude has you covered. Don't hesitate to test its 
range of skills across various tasks and topics.



Now that you've had an opportunity to try out Claude first-hand, here are a 
few tips on how to make the most out of your new AI assistant.



 <https://claude.ai>




The more information, the better



Don't hold back—share relevant information to get the most accurate and 
helpful responses.



Upload documents like PDFs, text files, and CSVs for Claude to analyze.





Ask follow-up questions



Think of Claude as a knowledgeable friend. If you need more information or 
clarification, just ask.



Follow-up questions help refine Claude's responses and can lead to more 
insightful conversations.




 



The more you chat with Claude, the quicker you’ll uncover the use cases that 
are right for you.


— The Anthropic Team



Get started with Claude <https://claude.ai>

email_payload.subject: British Council IELTS  - share your experience
email_payload.body:
Greetings!

We are very keen to hear from you about your recent IELTS test day experience.

Your feedback is important to us because it helps us improve the quality of our customer experience. Please share your views in this short and simple survey.

To start, please press the button below:
Take Survey

If you have any questions regarding the survey, please contact us here.

Thank you for your invaluable support.

Peter Hogg
Director Customer Management
British Council

Please do not reply directly to this message as this is an automatically generated email.

If you would prefer not to receive e-mails from British Council regarding this survey invitation in the future click here to automatically be removed from the data base.

Privacy Notice:

The British Council will not sell or disclose your details to any third parties except where required to do so by a legal request from a law enforcement agency. The British Council will treat all personal information in accordance with UK law and its own privacy policy.

Under UK Data Protection law you have the right to ask for a copy of the information we hold on you, for which we may charge a fee, and the right to ask us to correct any inaccuracies in that information. If you want more information about this please contact your local British Council office or see our website: https://www.britishcouncil.org/privacy.

© 2024 British Council
The United Kingdom's international organisation for cultural relations and educational opportunities. A registered charity: 209131 (England and Wales) SC037733 (Scotland).

Design with Canva
 
 
 
Community Spotlight
 
 
Here’s to the unsung heroes
 
 
This week, we celebrated five extraordinary teachers – the newest members of the National Teachers Hall of Fame.

These educators pour their hearts into their classrooms. So we gave some of that love back, donating $200K to support them and their schools.

The surprise was captured on video and honestly, it’s too special not to share.
Watch the surprise
 
 
 

Supported by the Canva Foundation

When you design with Canva, you're part of a community helping to design real change. Together, every design, print order, and subscription helps support programs like this one — giving back to people and the planet.

Access Claude anywhere you are with our free iOS and Android apps.







Take Claude on-the-go

<https://apps.apple.com/us/app/claude-by-anthropic/id6473753684?utm_source=email&utm_campaign=warming>
 andAndroid 
<https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anthropic.claude&utm_source=email&utm_campaign=warming>
 apps.




Seamless experience


Get answers, brainstorm, and accomplish tasks by chatting with Claude across 
the web and mobile apps. Your chatsautomatically sync between devices so you 
can pick up right where you left off.







Create Artifacts


Claude can create content like code snippets, text documents, or even web apps 
that appear in a dedicated window alongside your conversation.







Upload images


Easily upload images and files, or take photos with your camera for real-time 
image analysis on-the-go.

email_payload.subject: Catherine, follow Vivek Ramaswamy - Founder at Vivek Ramaswamy

email_payload.subject: Catherine, our final priority deadline is approaching
email_payload.body:
Hult
 
 
  
https://view.info.hult.edu/?qs=39745c5711108c52821cd090903f42ced51128f27297bf08b6b201ef24a6efe088d7441a9b20c7f080e382cf030c30d10ba5ca5cb873d4df75376dcef1f07e3d605c05f6a3ea0a4bcbcaf213e9cb367d842f8f85ef5cf0fa

https://click.info.hult.edu/?qs=3f48ea623d048579dc648082a911d06530ff46f32d2c82d9ff9c09b9453ff783049a20677719426a8b71246e93039b62a797429594555dcd 

https://click.info.hult.edu/?qs=3f48ea623d048579dc648082a911d06530ff46f32d2c82d9ff9c09b9453ff783049a20677719426a8b71246e93039b62a797429594555dcd 

https://click.info.hult.edu/?qs=3f48ea623d048579dc648082a911d06530ff46f32d2c82d9ff9c09b9453ff783049a20677719426a8b71246e93039b62a797429594555dcd 


  


 


The Final Priority Deadline Is Approaching 


 


Deadline: June 1

https://www.hult.edu/undergraduate/apply-now/ 
Apply Now 


 



 
 


 
Hi Catherine,

 

I wanted to get in touch personally to let you know that our final priority deadline is approaching, and I’m very interested in reviewing your application. 

 

June 1 marks our final priority application deadline of the year. So far, students from over 100 nationalities have already confirmed their places, making this our most diverse class ever—and I think you could make a valuable addition.  

 


During the late admissions period, we will help prioritize your application, which means you'll receive an expedited admissions decision, an individualized scholarship consultation, and personalized support throughout the application process.  

 


Hult students are characterized by their ambition and their entrepreneurial spirit—they are bold global citizens and trailblazers. If you can see yourself as part of this group of future leaders, I hope you will join us.  


  
https://www.hult.edu/undergraduate/apply-now/ 
Apply Now 


  


  



I look forward to reviewing your application soon, Catherine.


  
 Best wishes,

  


 Deji Adesina
Regional Director of Enrollment 


 Email: 
mailto:parth.sahni@hult.edu?subject= 
deji.adesina@hult.edu 


  


  
 
 Hult International Business School is Triple Accredited

email_payload.subject: Catherine, Apply to LIU!
email_payload.body:
LONG ISLAND UNIVERSITY
 

Hi Catherine, 

Long Island University, recognized as a College of Distinction and a Best National University, awards over $100 million in scholarships & grants each year.

We invite you to explore Long Island University—ranked in the top 7% of research universities in the United States.

  • Three campus locations in downtown Brooklyn, the Gold Coast of Long Island and across the globe
  • 200+ majors in competitive fields such as artificial intelligence, business, accounting, nursing, veterinary technology, computer science, performing arts, education, music technology and production, sports management and more
  • 100+ clubs and organizations
  • Student-run businesses that provide on campus engaged learning
  • Prestigious internships and career opportunities 
  • 38 Division I athletic teams 
  • Network of over 285,000 alumni around the world 

I invite you to apply to Long Island University knowing that the best days of your life are just ahead. Join us Shark Nation.

Sincerely,

Michael Berthel
Vice President of Student Affairs & Enrollment Management
APPLY 
 

Application Waiver Fee Code: LIU25
 

 

VISIT LONG ISLAND UNIVERSITY

We look forward to meeting you! Visit one of our campuses for an in-person open house or campus tour. Can't make it to campus? Join us for a virtual information session! Visit liu.edu/visit.
Click the buttons below to download the
LIU FUTURE SHARK
mobile app in the App Store or on Google Play.

 

Long Island University | liu.edu

* thiscountry - Full time dog servant documenting the ordinaries photos and videos are captured by me unless they are credited reblogs Thanks for stopping by - https://www.tumblr.com/follow/thiscountry
  
* markscherz - Dr Mark D. Scherz
Curator of Herpetology at the Natural History Museum of Denmark. I work mostly on the reptiles and amphibians of Madagascar. Also a photographer and occasional poet. Sometimes I bake.
My tumblr is concerned mainly with reptiles and... - https://www.tumblr.com/follow/markscherz
  
* rebeccathenaturalist - Master Naturalist, Nature Educator &amp; Writer, Author of "The Everyday Naturalist: How to Identify Animals, Plants and Fungi Wherever You Go" (Ten Speed Press, Summer 2025); PNW Nature Tour Guide, All-Around Nature Nerd. AuDHD. Reblogs, OC, Weekly Deep... - https://www.tumblr.com/follow/rebeccathenaturalist
  
* herpsandbirds - Hey there, I'm Paxon, a wildlife biologist, living in the SE United States. I've been on Tumblr since 2009.  We're here to share the beauty of herps and birds, as well as fishes and invertebrates.Cis-male. He/him. Queer. Texas. - https://www.tumblr.com/follow/herpsandbirds

EXPLORE YOUR CAMPUS LIFE

BROOKLYN POST GLOBAL

100+ Clubs, Organizations & Student Run Businesses

Explore your passions in one of the many student clubs, join a Greek organization, or contribute to one of the student-run businesses. Participate in community service or join one of 38 Division 1 Athletic Teams!

On-Campus Amenities & Nearby Attractions

Enjoy on-campus amenities such as the Gold Coast Cinema, Starbucks, Subway, Shark Bite, and Cardio & Strength Fitness Centers. Explore all of the local NYC & Brooklyn sights and Long Island Beaches!

Popular Events and Traditions

Join fun campus events including Welcome Week, Freshman Toast, Homecoming, Midnight Breakfast, Midnight Madness, Holidays at Hillwood, Senior Toast & more! 
 

Long Island University | liu.edu

email_payload.subject: Your exclusive access to IELTS Ready Premium - and more!
email_payload.body:
test
Registration ref. no:
A3-AE222-S-13205330
Dear CATHERINE ANN FERNANDEZ,
We have some great news!
To help you succeed in your IELTS Academic (IELTS on computer) test on Sunday 25 May 2025, we are giving you free access to IELTS Ready Premium, powered by GEL IELTS Prep.
These resources are only available for British Council IELTS Test Takers and will help you be at your best on test day. Be sure to check out IELTS Ready Premium today!
LAUNCH IELTS READY PREMIUM
You can log in to your Test Taker Portal account to find all relevant test details and to contact us.
Log in to Test Taker Portal
IELTS Ready Premium features:
40 full practice tests to ensure you're fully ready
practice questions tailored to your abilities and past performance
guidance and model answers to improve how well you do in the Speaking and Writing sections
scoring and feedback on Listening and Reading exercises
live and recorded webinars
And why not try IELTS Coach?
If you would like more support, IELTS Coach is a flexible preparation course. Mix private and group classes, choose the skills you need to focus on, at a pace and intensity that suits your schedule. You’ll feel prepared, confident and excited to take on the IELTS challenge!
Learn more
Any questions? Feel free to contact us.
Thank you,
The IELTS Team
British Council is a proud co-owner of IELTS.
Abu Dhabi University, Knowledge Group
Address:
Abu Dhabi University, IELTS Center, Khalifa City, Abu Dhabi
Phone:
+971 2501 5411/+971 3709 0500/+971 4248 1584
Email:
ielts@knowledgegroup.co
Website:
https://www.knowledgegroup.co/en-us/IELTS/Pages/home.aspx

Try out Artifacts, Claude's powerful feature for real-time collaboration.







Working with Artifacts




Artifacts is a popular feature, and a powerful way to work and collaborate 
with Claude.

 
<https://claude.ai/new?q=Hi%20Claude,%20can%20you%20create%20an%208%20bit%20style%20crab%20using%20SVG?>



When you ask Claude to create content like code snippets, text documents, or 
web apps, Artifacts appear in a dedicated window alongside your conversation.

Try Artifacts now 
<https://claude.ai/new?q=Hi%20Claude,%20can%20you%20create%20an%208%20bit%20style%20crab%20using%20SVG?>


 
<https://claude.ai/new?q=Hi%20Claude,%20can%20you%20create%20a%20simple%20to-do%20list%20web%20app%20for%20me?>



Artifacts allow you to see, edit, and build upon Claude's creations in 
real-time. Ready to explore the power of Artifacts? Start a new chat with 
Claude and ask it to create something for you.


— The Anthropic Team

Design with Canva
 
 
 
Community Spotlight
 
 
Here’s to the unsung heroes
 
 
This week, we celebrated five extraordinary teachers – the newest members of the National Teachers Hall of Fame.

These educators pour their hearts into their classrooms. So we gave some of that love back, donating $200K to support them and their schools.

The surprise was captured on video and honestly, it’s too special not to share.
Watch the surprise

Tips to get the most out of Claude, your new AI assistant.







Start chatting with Claude




From brainstorming your next report to debugging tricky code, or even 
suggesting dinner ideas—Claude has you covered. Don't hesitate to test its 
range of skills across various tasks and topics.



Now that you've had an opportunity to try out Claude first-hand, here are a 
few tips on how to make the most out of your new AI assistant.



 <https://claude.ai>




The more information, the better



Don't hold back—share relevant information to get the most accurate and 
helpful responses.



Upload documents like PDFs, text files, and CSVs for Claude to analyze.





Ask follow-up questions



Think of Claude as a knowledgeable friend. If you need more information or 
clarification, just ask.



Follow-up questions help refine Claude's responses and can lead to more 
insightful conversations.




 



The more you chat with Claude, the quicker you’ll uncover the use cases that 
are right for you.


— The Anthropic Team
